data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Supersignoj are dicritical marks.

    There are several ways of typing Esperanto characters in ASCII,
    this module converts between all of them.

    It's in Lingua::, because this is very specific to Esperanto. It is
    not in Encode::, because it has nothing to do with the core
    Encode.pm
